Working on my blog

Trying to build me up

Posted by Eddie Rangel on April 14, 2015
Blogging

I’ve owned EddieRangel.com for more than 10 years now. It has seen many incarnations. From static html to being a Google Site. Prior to this it was a GitHub Page. It is now being hosted on Ghost.org.

Why the Change?

I’ve been wanting to refine my online web presence. I see many developers online who are doing amazing things. I want to build a presence that accomplishes what many others are doing. I have many code samples on GitHub but also would like a space to share my insight into what I do and how I do it.

Dev Career Boost

I’m not sure where I first heard about John Sonmez, but he kept popping up in different blogs and podcasts I follow. He has a blog called SimpleProgrammer. I read about a course he offers that provides insight into how to market yourself as a developer by blogging, DevCareerBoost.

Given that this is something that I want to work on and develop, I went ahead and signed up for his offering. It did not hurt that it was free. I feel his course has provided me with some value into what I should be doing to market myself as a developer. This new blog and this post specifically could be attributed to me going through his course.

So, here’s to my new blog!

Cheers!
